name: Yily
description:
This game is made by Arydev,Juanlr,Kapdev,and Madhavaprasath

this game is about friends one named petro and another name is frend 

w,a,s,d when flying a,d to move press space to fly and e to interact

arrows to move frend and right control to interact

we recommend you to play in this resolution 1024*600
